HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Additions: - Recompiled for RimWorld v1.1! - Added Humanlike → Mechs and Mech-like → Humanlike surgery patching. Use at your own risk!
Fixes: - Fixed patch crashes from certain pawn kinds

Fixes: - Better support for certain pawn kinds - Force a refresh the surgery operations cache, which earlier mods might have activated prematurely Tweaks: - Added a few more body part keywords and adjectives to the static mapper list

Additions: - Expanded patching to include removal operations and certain "special" operations from a few different mods - All surgeries are now sorted after patching Fixes: - Fixed a bug in animal surgery identification that blocked many animal surgery additions - Patching is now much more optimized, even for large amounts of surgeries and pawn types - The "part-to-part" mapper is primed with a static part group list to help identify certain animal parts Tweaks: - Added timers to injection debug lines
